metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0396 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
BIND 9.16.11 -> 9.16.26, 9.17.0 -> 9.18.0 and versions 9.16.11-S1 -> 9.16.26-S1 of the BIND Supported Preview Edition. Specifically crafted TCP streams can cause connections to BIND to remain in CLOSE_WAIT status for an indefinite period of time, even after the client has terminated the connection.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0396` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9-host - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9-libs - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9-utils - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9utils - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
dnsutils - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3').
